thread.title: U.S. Concrete Announces Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.50 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. Concrete Announces Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.50 From Continuing Operations
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Us Concrete Inc:
* U.S. CONCRETE ANNOUNCES ITS FULL YEAR 2017 AND FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 7.1 PERCENT TO $341.4 MILLION * QTRLY NET LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO U.S. CONCRETE $0.19 PER DILUTED SHARE
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.84, REVENUE VIEW $355.2 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
